anya-e0501n15:1: Tividho indriyapaccayo sahajātindriyapaccayo pure jātindriyapaccayo rūpajīvitindriyapaccayo.
anya-e0501n15:2_0: Tattha pannarasindriyadhammā sahajātindriyapaccayo nāma, jīvitindriyaṁ manindriyaṁ
anya-e0501n15:2_1: sukhindriyaṁ dukkhindriyaṁ somanassindriyaṁ domanassindriyaṁ upekkhindriyaṁ saddhindriyaṁ
anya-e0501n15:2_2: vīriyindriyaṁ satindriyaṁ samādhindriyaṁ paññindriyaṁ anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ aññindriyaṁ
anya-e0501n15:2_3: aññātāvindriyanti. Tehi sahajātā cittacetasikadhammā ca rūpadhammā ca tassa paccayuppannā.
anya-e0501n15:3: Pañcindriyarūpāni purejātindriyapaccayo, cakkhundriyaṁ sotindriyaṁ ghānindriyaṁ jivhindriyaṁ kāyindriyaṁ. Pañcaviññāṇacitta cetasika dhammā tassa paccayuppannā.
anya-e0501n15:4: Ekaṁ rūpajīvitindriyaṁ rūpajīvitindriyapaccayo. Sabbāni kammaja rūpāni jīvitarūpavajjitāni tassa paccayuppannāni.
anya-e0501n15:5_0: Kenaṭṭhena indriyanti. Issariyaṭṭhena indriyaṁ. Tattha kattha issariyanti. Attano
anya-e0501n15:5_1: attano paccayuppannesu dhammesu issariyaṁ. Kasmiṁ kasmiṁ kicce issariyanti. Attano
anya-e0501n15:5_2: attano kicce issariyaṁ. Nāmajīvitaṁ sampayuttadhammānaṁ jīvanakicce issariyaṁ. Jīvanakicceti
anya-e0501n15:5_3: āyuvaḍḍhanakicce, santatiṭhitiyā cirakālaṭhitikicceti attho. Manindriyaṁ ārammaṇaggahaṇakicce
anya-e0501n15:5_4: sampayuttadhammānaṁ issariyaṁ. Avaseso indriyaṭṭho pubbe indriyayamakadīpaniyaṁ vuttoyeva.
anya-e0501n15:6_0: Ettha vadeyya, dve itthindriyapurisindriyadhammā indriyabhūtā samānāpi kasmā indriyapaccaye
anya-e0501n15:6_1: visuṁ na gahitāti. Paccayakiccassa abhāvato. Tividhañhi paccayakiccaṁ jananakiccañca
anya-e0501n15:6_2: upatthambhanakiccañca anupālanakiccañca. Tattha yo paccayo paccayuppannadhammassa
anya-e0501n15:6_3: uppādāya paccayo hoti, yasmiṁ asati paccayuppanno dhammo na uppajjati, tassa paccayakiccaṁ
anya-e0501n15:6_4: jananakiccaṁ nāma. Yathā anantarapaccayo. Yo paccayo paccayuppannadhammassa ṭhitiyā
anya-e0501n15:6_5: ca vuḍḍhiyā ca viruḷhiyā ca paccayo hoti, yasmiṁ asati paccayuppanno dhammo na tiṭṭhati
anya-e0501n15:6_6: na vaḍḍhati na virūhati, tassa paccayakiccaṁ upatthambhanakiccaṁ nāma. Yathā pacchājātapaccayo.
anya-e0501n15:6_7: Yo paccayo paccayuppannassa dhammassa pavattiyā paccayo hoti, yena vinā paccayuppanno
anya-e0501n15:6_8: dhammo cirakālaṁ na pavattati, santati gamanaṁ chijjati, tassa paccaya kiccaṁ anupālanakiccaṁ
anya-e0501n15:6_9: nāma. Yathā rūpa jīvitindriyapaccayo. Ete pana dve indriyadhammā tesu tīsu paccaya
anya-e0501n15:6_10: kiccesu ekakiccaṁpi nasādhenti, tasmā ete dve dhammā indriya paccaye visuṁ na gahitāti.
anya-e0501n15:7_0: Etaṁ sante ete dve dhammā indriyātipi na vattabbāti. No na vattabbā. Kasmā. Indriyakiccasabbhāvatoti.
anya-e0501n15:7_1: Kiṁ pana etesaṁ indriyakiccanti. Liṅganimittakuttaākappesu issaratā indriya kiccaṁ.
anya-e0501n15:7_2: Tathā hi yassa puggalassa paṭisandhikkhaṇe itthindriyarūpaṁ uppajjati, tassa santāne
anya-e0501n15:7_3: catūhi kammādīhi paccayehi uppannā pañcakkhandha dhammā itthibhāvāya pariṇamanti,
anya-e0501n15:7_4: so attabhāvo ekantena itthiliṅga itthinimitta itthikutta itthākappayutto hoti, no
anya-e0501n15:7_5: aññathā. Na ca itthindriyarūpaṁ te pañcakkhandhadhamme janeti, na ca upatthambhati,
anya-e0501n15:7_6: nāpi anupāleti, atha kho te dhammā attano attano paccayehi uppajjamānā evañcevañca
anya-e0501n15:7_7: uppajjantūti āṇaṁ ṭhapentaṁ viya tesu attano anubhāvaṁ pavatteti. Te ca dhammā tatheva
anya-e0501n15:7_8: uppajjanti, no aññathāti. Ayaṁ itthindriyarūpassa itthiliṅgādīsu issaratā. Esa nayo
anya-e0501n15:7_9: purisindriyarūpassa purisaliṅgādīsu issaratāyaṁ. Evaṁ ete dve dhammā liṅgādīsu indriyakicca
anya-e0501n15:8_0: Hadayavatthurūpaṁ pana dvinnaṁ viññāṇadhātūnaṁ nissayavatthukiccaṁ sādhayamānaṁpi
anya-e0501n15:8_1: tāsu indriyakiccaṁ na sādheti. Na hi bhāvita cittassa puggalassa hadayarūpe pasannevā
anya-e0501n15:8_2: appasanne vā jātepi manoviññāṇadhātuyo tadanuvattikā hontīti. Indriya paccayadīpanā niṭṭhitā.
